ComicInfo.Summary:
It's an all-out confrontation as the Mutantimals clash with the Splinter Dojo for the fate of Mutant Town! Will the TMNT be able to keep their students from harm and take the fight to Old Hob?
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- A | Cover A | Jodi Nishijima | 1 | B | Cover B | Kevin Eastman (a) & Fahriza Kamaputra (c) | 2 | RI | 1:10 Retailer Incentive Cover | Paris Alleyne | 3 | RE | IDW Online Exclusive Variant Cover | Francine Delgado (a, c), Mostafa Moussa (i) & Raul Angolo (c) | 4 |
